long_description: Sized specifically to work with the SportRack Hitch Mounted Folding Cargo Carrier, this Hitch Basket cargo net easily attaches to the basket to secure your gear for travel. Flexible material stretches to accommodate your gear. The Hitch Basket cargo net features 16 hooks around the perimeter for secure attachment to the carrier.
short_description: Sized specifically to work with the SportRack Hitch Mounted Folding Cargo Carrier, this Hitch Basket cargo net easily attaches to the basket to secure your gear for travel.
